column4: i aborted the "apt-get update" process in between by ctrl+z.....now when i tried redoing it...it gives an error reffering to come lock problem..kindly help
erusul: what did oyu mean..run. jobs
«jobs» will show you any jobs you suspended with ^Z
if that's the only one listed, you can resume it with «fg»
are you running it from the same terminal you started the apt job on?
